edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.classproject.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridMember, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrueRoom

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements GridMember, java.io.Serializable
    The Room class implements the GridMember and Serializable interfaces. The serializable will save which room contains the briefcase and the grid member interface all share the toString method,
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean briefcase
      The boolean briefcase is an attribute that all rooms possess.

      Room() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void giveBriefcase()
      The giveBriefcase method will give a random room a briefcase, but only one room is allowed to have a briefcase.
      boolean hasBriefcase()
      The hasBriefcase method will return the boolean attribute whenever the player tries to access the room from the top.
      boolean isDoor(int playerDirection)
      The isDoor method checks whether or not the player entering the room from the top of the room.
      boolean isSeen()
      The isSeen method is a method from the interface grid member.
      boolean isSomething()
      The isSomething method is a method from the grid member interface.
      void resetSee()
      The resetSee method is empty here because the room is always visible to the player no matter what happens.
      void see()
      The see method will reveal the object from the darkness or a shadow, something that is not meant to be seen until the player gains vision of it.
      javax.swing.ImageIcon toImage()
      The toImage method is the same as the toString method, but was created for the use of a GUI.
      java.lang.String toString()
      The toString method represents the room as [R] when the print grid method is called.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • briefcase

        private boolean briefcase
        The boolean briefcase is an attribute that all rooms possess. A room will either have a briefcase or not, only one room may have a briefcase at any given instance of the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room()

    • Method Detail

      • isDoor

        public boolean isDoor(int playerDirection)
        The isDoor method checks whether or not the player entering the room from the top of the room. Otherwise the player will not be able to access the room.

      • giveBriefcase

        public void giveBriefcase()
        The giveBriefcase method will give a random room a briefcase, but only one room is allowed to have a briefcase. Please see grid class for how this is done.

      • hasBriefcase

        public boolean hasBriefcase()
        The hasBriefcase method will return the boolean attribute whenever the player tries to access the room from the top.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The toString method represents the room as [R] when the print grid method is called. There should only be nine of these on the grid. Eight if the radar has been found.
        Specified by:
        toString in interface GridMember
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • resetSee

        public void resetSee()
        The resetSee method is empty here because the room is always visible to the player no matter what happens. This method is mainly for everything else, but this method was from the interface of grid member.
        Specified by:
        resetSee in interface GridMember

      • isSomething

        public boolean isSomething()
        The isSomething method is a method from the grid member interface. This method represents that an object created from the Room class is considered as something.
        Specified by:
        isSomething in interface GridMember

      • isSeen

        public boolean isSeen()
        The isSeen method is a method from the interface grid member. When something is seen, they are considered visible to the player, but since the room objects will always be visible, this is just left here to satisfy the interfcase.
        Specified by:
        isSeen in interface GridMember

      • see

        public void see()
        The see method will reveal the object from the darkness or a shadow, something that is not meant to be seen until the player gains vision of it. This method is not needed, because the room objects will always be visible.
        Specified by:
        see in interface GridMember

      • toImage

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon toImage()
        The toImage method is the same as the toString method, but was created for the use of a GUI.
        Specified by:
        toImage in interface GridMember
